name: Njoya Medin Praise Alambi
bio: I'm a passionate and driven tech enthusiast with a sharp eye for innovation and a love for building solutions that make an impact. I specialize in software development, creative problem-solving, and turning bold ideas into real-world products. I lead engineering and product strategy, mentoring teams to deliver scalable systems, and I enjoy working across the stack â€” from APIs and databases to accessible frontends. Outside work I contribute to open-source and enjoy technical writing.

name: Ngeminang Precious
bio: Backend engineer focused on reliable systems, integrations and data workflows. I design APIs, build resilient services, and ensure observability and security across production systems. I enjoy mentoring engineers and improving team delivery through pragmatic engineering practices.

name: Beri Pamela Mengnjoh
role: CMO (Chief Marketing Officer) / UI/UX Designer, frontend developer
bio: Product and design leader crafting usable, delightful interfaces. I combine user research, interaction design and frontend engineering to ship polished products. My work focuses on creating clear journeys that convert and delight customers while keeping accessibility and performance in mind.

name: Che Hermaan Bright
role: CTO (Chief Technology Officer) / Technical analyst and research specialist
bio: A results-driven software engineer with a strong foundation in frontend and systems thinking. I help teams design scalable architectures and translate product goals into engineering roadmaps. My interests include performance optimization, distributed systems, and developer experience.
